page.description: Bars Method that generates appropriate characters for intelligent mail code.
page.discussion: The required fonts have been added to the InstallationSupport folder. The example for generating a barcode on a bitmap in the interactive window is included.
page.example:
'Text = "72367219931914949452457875197" encodes the following data: 'Barcode ID: 72 'Service ID: 367 'Mailer ID: 219931914 'Serial #: 949452 'Zip code: 457875197
ui_bitmap_create("barcode",3,1) ui_bitmap_draw("barcode",<<%code% #set_brush("White") #fill_rect(0,0,3,1) #set_font("USPSIMBStandard,12") #text(::USPS::OneCode::Bars("72367219931914949452457875197"),.25,.25) #%code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image_opaque=barcode}")
